metadata.title: AI Cruisers
metadata.author: R4V3-0N, Chrono Vortex, and Vertaalfout
metadata.description:
THIS MOD HAS DEPENDENCIES! Make sure to patch "Vertex Tags and Utility Functions" first! (link bellow)
This mod adds a new race of AI hardlight Avatars from a distant universe which will eventually be developed upon further, both with type B and C layouts as well as eventually events and lore inspired by the AI Avatar race from Captains Edition and Hyperspace by Sleeper Service.
This sample includes: - AI Cruiser type A, B, and C with achievements! - 13 New Weapons - Effector mk I, and II; a projector that hacks into enemy systems. - Heavy Effector, a projector that hacks and disrupts enemy systems for longer. - Chain Effector, a chain variation of the Effector designed to keep enemies disrupted after a few shots. - Auto Beam, a beam that after firing drops to a quick 2.5 second cooldown. - Splitter Focus Beam I, II, and III; a series of 'flak' beams that fire several pinpoint beams over a radius. - EMP Device mk I, and II; a series of weapons that fires projectiles that knocks down 2 layers of shields on impact, and deals ion damage on room hit. - Heavy EMP Device, a variation that can knock down more shields and inflicts ion on adjacent rooms. - Ion Bust Beam, which can deal double damage on ionized rooms but in doing so clears the ion effect. - 7 New Drones - Interceptor Microfighter, a drone that is technically more sentient than you. An evasive drone that focuses fire on enemy defence drones before targeting the ship. - Shock Microfighter, piloted by an obnoxious avatar, this drone targets enemy systems with its light EMP device repeatedly while evading enemy fire. - Swarm Microfighter, the sword of a run away swarm-intelligence. Every alternating shot assimilates material to create a rudimentary attack drone. - Missile Drone Mk 1, 2, and 3, are temporary drones that fires off a small series of missiles before despawning. - Focus Beam Defence Drone, a Defence drone that shoots down enemy projectiles with beams, never misses! - New Race: AI Avatar's, a synthetic race of disposable hardlight avatars with many immunities - 6 New Augments - Hologram Emitter, an augment that lets you produce an AI hologram when one perishes at empty beacons - Anti-Gravity Engine, provides evasion when your engines or helm is disabled. - Sentient Combat AI, improves manning level of systems - Conductive Hull Plating. This hull plating allows your ship to create ion storms inside nebulas and regain lost reactor power in an ion storm. - Assimilative Drone Bays. Allowing the construction of temporary focus beam drones for destroyed enemy drones as well as a chance when your ships damaged. - Rerouted Insulation, gives the ship a 80% ion resistance while all crew onboard are more susceptable to stuns. ...and More!
Special thanks to Julk for providing additional assistance :)
Download Vertex: https://github.com/ChronoVortex/FTL-HS-Vertex/releases/latest
